verbs.description: The head of the Homeland Security Department [V: is] defending the Trump administration 's separating of children from their parents when the family is being prosecuted for entering the U.S. illegally . Kirstjen Nielsen told the Senate Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs Committee on Tuesday that separating children from parents who have been accused of a crime happens " in the United States every day . " She says it 's based on her decision that anyone who breaks the law will be prosecuted .

" She says it 's based on her decision that anyone who breaks the law will be prosecuted .
